What's Included?

Ultra-luxury accommodation, 3 curated meals daily by private chefs, all luxury transportation, and expert local guides.

Payment Terms

Secure your journey with a 25% deposit. We offer flexible payment plans for the remaining balance up to 60 days before launch.

Health & Safety

Every expedition includes comprehensive travel insurance options and access to top-tier medical facilities in Ghana.

Custom Trips

Don't see your perfect route? We specialize in crafting bespoke itineraries for private groups of 4 or more.
